00041 QVariant EnvIdentifiersModel::data( const QModelIndex& index, 
00042                                                                    int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00043 
00044         if (!index.isValid())
00045                 return QVariant();
00046 
00047         // if row is invalid
00048         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00049                 return QVariant();
00050 
00051         if (Qt::DisplayRole == role) {
00052 
00053                 // split the identifier
00054                 QStringList fields = table_.at(index.row()).split(":");
00055 
00056                 // and return the correct field
00057                 return fields.value(index.column());
00058                 
00059         }
00060 
00061         // if unsupported role
00062         else {
00063                 return QVariant();
00064         }
00065 }

00067 QVariant EnvIdentifiersModel::headerData( int section, 
00068                                                                                  Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00069                                                                                  int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00070         if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal)
00071          return QVariant();
00072         
00073         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00074 
00075                 switch (section) {
00076                         case 0: 
00077                                 return tr("Language");
00078                         case 1:
00079                                 return tr("Tool");
00080                         case 2:
00081                                 return tr("Vendor specific");
00082                         default:
00083                                 return QVariant();
00084                 }
00085         }
00086         // if unsupported role
00087         else {
00088                 return QVariant();
00089         }
00090 }

00092 bool EnvIdentifiersModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index,
00093                                                                   const QVariant& value, 
00094                                                                   int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00095 
00096         if (!index.isValid())
00097                 return false;
00098 
00099         // if row is invalid
00100         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00101                 return false;
00102 
00103         if (Qt::EditRole == role) {
00104 
00105                 QStringList identifier = table_.at(index.row()).split(":");
00106                 identifier.replace(index.column(), value.toString());
00107                 QString result = identifier.value(0);
00108                 result += QString(":");
00109                 result += identifier.value(1);
00110                 result += QString(":");
00111                 result += identifier.value(2);
00112                 table_.replace(index.row(), result);
00113                 
00114                 emit contentChanged();
00115                 return true;
00116         }
00117         // if unsupported role
00118         else
00119                 return false;
00120 }

00136 void EnvIdentifiersModel::apply() {

00144 void EnvIdentifiersModel::restore() {
00145 
00146         beginResetModel();
00147         table_.clear();
00148         table_ = view_->getEnvIdentifiers();
00149         endResetModel();

00152 void EnvIdentifiersModel::onRemoveRow( int row ) {
00153         // if row is invalid
00154         if (row < 0 || row >= table_.size())
00155                 return;
00156 
00157         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00158 
00159         // remove the object from the map
00160         table_.removeAt(row);
00161 
00162         endRemoveRows();
00163 
00164         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00165         emit contentChanged();
00166 }

00168 void EnvIdentifiersModel::onAddRow() {
00169         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00170 
00171         table_.append(QString("::"));
00172 
00173         endInsertRows();
00174 
00175         // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
